mapper.select: select * from notice order by no desc and use_state='o'
select * from notice where no=(select min(no) from notice where no>#{no}) and top_state='x' and use_state='o'
select * from notice where no=(select max(no) from notice where no<#{no}) and top_state='x' and use_state='o'
select * from notice where top_state ='o' and use_state like concat('%',#{use_state},'%') order by no desc;
mapper.update: update notice set top_state=#{top_state}, writer=#{writer}, regdate=#{regdate}, cnt=#{cnt}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, use_state=#{use_state} where no=#{no}
update notice set cnt=cnt+1 where no=#{no}
update notice set useState=#{use_state} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select * from notice where top_state='x' and use_state='o' order by no desc, regdate desc limit #{pageStart},#{perPageNum}
select * from notice where top_state='x' order by no desc, regdate desc limit #{pageStart},#{perPageNum}
select count(no) from notice where top_state='x' and use_state='o'
select count(no) from notice where top_state='x'
